email.title: PDT Partners Open House
email.text:
Hi everyone,
Our sponsor, PDT Partners, a boutique quantitative trading firm, is hosting an open house office visit **eligible for second year students and above**.
If you're an eligible student and looking for an internship or industrial placement, check out more details about their event below!

event.location: PDT Partners, 1 Bishopsgate, 3rd Floor, London, EC2N 3AQ
event.text:
PDT Partners - a boutique quantitative trading firm - is thrilled to partner again with Imperial for its 2019 Industrial Placement and Internship programs.
We're hosting an open house the day before the Sponsors' Exhibition to give Imperial students an opportunity to check out the office, and meet some of the engineers we have working in the office while enjoying some food and drinks.
Your hosts for the evening are [Charlotte Oldfield](https://www.linkedin.com/in/charlotte-oldfield-76964962/), and [Aaron Rosen](https://www.linkedin.com/in/aaronhrosen/).
**RSVP here (strictly second years and up only):** https://event.pingg.com/PDTOpenHouse
